speaker: Tessa
text: If I had completed that cloud certification last year, I would be leading this infrastructure project now.
ipa: ɪf aɪ hæd kəmˈpliːtɪd ðæt klaʊd ˌsɝtɪfɪˈkeɪʃən læst jɪɹ, aɪ wʊd bi ˈliːdɪŋ ðɪs ˌɪnfrəˈstɹʌktʃɚ ˈpɹɑdʒɛkt naʊ.
stress: If I had COMPLETED that CLOUD CERTIFICATION last year, I would be LEADING this INFRASTRUCTURE PROJECT now.
linking:
"had completed" → /hæd kəmˈpliːtɪd/ (d + c linking)
"would be" → /wʊd bi/ (d + b linking)

speaker: Rahul
text: Yeah… If I had applied earlier for the mentorship program, I would be working with the architecture team by now.
ipa: jæ… ɪf aɪ hæd əˈplaɪd ˈɝliɚ fɔɹ ðə ˈmɛn.tɔɹ.ʃɪp ˈpɹoʊ.ɡræm, aɪ wʊd bi ˈwɝkɪŋ wɪð ði ˈɑɹ.kəˌtɛk.tʃɚ tim baɪ naʊ.
stress: Yeah… If I had APPLIED EARLIER for the MENTORSHIP PROGRAM, I would be WORKING with the ARCHITECTURE TEAM by now.
linking:
"had applied" → /hæd əˈplaɪd/ (d + a linking)
"would be" → /wʊd bi/ (d + b linking)

speaker: Tessa
text: It’s frustrating, right? If we had planned our goals more intentionally, things would look different today.
ipa: ɪts ˈfɹʌstreɪtɪŋ, ɹaɪt? ɪf wi hæd plænd aʊɹ ɡoʊlz mɔɹ ɪnˈtɛnʃənəli, θɪŋz wʊd lʊk ˈdɪfɹənt təˈdeɪ.
stress: It’s FRUSTRATING, right? If we had PLANNED our GOALS more INTENTIONALLY, things would look DIFFERENT today.
linking:
"had planned" → /hæd plænd/ (d + p linking)
"would look" → /wʊd lʊk/ (d + l linking)

speaker: Rahul
text: Totally. If I hadn’t taken so long to finish that last project, I might be managing the next client rollout.
ipa: ˈtoʊtəli. ɪf aɪ ˈhædənt ˈteɪkən soʊ lɔŋ tu ˈfɪnɪʃ ðæt læst ˈpɹɑdʒɛkt, aɪ maɪt bi ˈmænɪdʒɪŋ ðə nɛkst ˈklaɪənt ˈɹoʊˌlaʊt.
stress: TOTALLY. If I HADN’T TAKEN so LONG to FINISH that LAST PROJECT, I might be MANAGING the NEXT CLIENT ROLLOUT.
linking:
"hadn’t taken" → /ˈhædənt ˈteɪkən/ (t + t linking)
"might be" → /maɪt bi/ (t + b linking)

speaker: Tessa
text: Ugh, same. If only I had said yes to that internal mobility offer, I wouldn’t be stuck maintaining legacy code again.
ipa: ʌɡ, seɪm. ɪf ˈoʊnli aɪ hæd sɛd jɛs tu ðæt ɪnˈtɝnəl moʊˈbɪləti ˈɔfɚ, aɪ ˈwʊdənt bi stʌk meɪnˈteɪnɪŋ ˈlɛɡəsi koʊd əˈɡɛn.
stress: Ugh, SAME. If ONLY I had SAID YES to that INTERNAL MOBILITY OFFER, I wouldn’t be STUCK MAINTAINING LEGACY CODE again.
linking:
"had said" → /hæd sɛd/ (d + s linking)
"wouldn’t be" → /ˈwʊdənt bi/ (t + b linking)

speaker: Rahul
text: Well… better late than never. If you start prepping now, you can still apply for the next round.
ipa: wɛl… ˈbɛtɚ leɪt ðæn ˈnɛvɚ. ɪf ju stɑɹt ˈpɹɛpɪŋ naʊ, ju kæn stɪl əˈplaɪ fɔɹ ðə nɛkst ɹaʊnd.
stress: Well… BETTER LATE than NEVER. If you START PREPPING now, you can still APPLY for the NEXT ROUND.
linking:
"start prepping" → /stɑɹt ˈpɹɛpɪŋ/ (t + p linking)
"can still" → /kæn stɪl/ (n + s linking)
